title: Romantic NSW South Coast Food & Wine-Lovers Retreat with Gourmet Breakfast Hamper & Cellar Door Tasting
description:
Indulge your senses and inner wine connoisseur with a stay at a boutique winery set amid gently undulating hills on the NSW South Coast -  a recent honeymoon destination on the Married at First Sight TV show. Surrounded by rows of vines, Cupitt's Estate is home to just 10 architecturally designed villas, each featuring modern-yet-cosy features that allow guests to reconnect with nature.

Enjoy outstanding service and superb elegance as days are spent exploring the lush grounds, tasting gourmet food and fine wines, sharing brews over views at the onsite brewery, or simply relaxing on your private deck overlooking the eucalypt tree line. Dine on farm-to-table fare at the onsite restaurant and sample award-winning cool-climate wines from the cellar door before returning to your private villa, affording views of the pastoral surrounds from your balcony.
offer_address: 58 Washburton Rd, Ulladulla, New South Wales 2539, Australia

title: NSW South Coast Romantic Wine-Lovers Retreat with Complimentary Minibar, Gourmet Breakfast Hamper & Cellar Door Tasting
description:
Indulge your senses and inner wine connoisseur with a stay at the beautiful Cupitt's Estate, a boutique property set amid gently undulating hills on the New South Wales South Coast. A private haven of just 10 architecturally designed accommodation pods, this recent addition to the family-owned Cupitt's Estate is ideally located for leaving the hustle and bustle behind as you embrace the serenity of this picturesque part of the world and reconnect with nature.

Enjoy outstanding service and superb elegance as days are spent exploring the lush grounds and vines, tasting gourmet food and fine wines, sharing brews over views at the onsite brewery, or simply relaxing on your private deck overlooking the eucalypt tree line. Explore the native grounds and nearby vineyards, dine on farm-to-table sustainable fare at the onsite restaurant and sample award-winning cool-climate wines from the cellar door before returning to your private pod, affording views of the bucolic surrounds from your balcony.
offer_address: 58 Washburton Rd, Ulladulla, New South Wales 2539, Australia

title: Boutique NSW South Coast Vineyard Villas with Gourmet Breakfast Hamper & Wine Tasting Experience
description:
Indulge the senses of your inner wine connoisseur with a stay at a boutique, family-run winery set amid gently undulating hills on the New South Wales South Coast. Surrounded by rows of vines, this romantic hideaway is home to just 10 architecturally designed villas, featuring modern-yet-cosy features that allow guests to reconnect with nature. 

Dine on farm-to-table fare at the onsite restaurant and sample award-winning, cool-climate wines from the cellar door before returning to your private villa. Enjoy outstanding service and superb elegance as days are spent exploring the lush grounds, tasting gourmet food and fine wines, or simply relax on your private terrace overlooking the eucalypt tree line. The wines are inspired by the winemaking of Southern Europe, vineyards of Southern New South Wales and lifestyle of the South Coast.
offer_address: 58 Washburton Rd, Ulladulla, New South Wales 2539, Australia

title: NSW South Coast Romantic Wine-Lovers Retreat with Gourmet Breakfast Hamper, Cellar Door Tasting & Nightly Cocktail
description:
Indulge your senses and inner wine connoisseur with a stay at the beautiful Cupitt's Estate, a boutique property set amid gently undulating hills on the New South Wales South Coast. Nestled within rolling green hills and surrounded by rows of vines, this secluded property is home to just 10 luxury, architecturally designed pod cabins, each beautifully designed with minimal modern-yet cosy features that allow guests to reconnect with nature. 

Enjoy outstanding service and superb elegance as days are spent exploring the lush grounds and vines, tasting gourmet food and fine wines, sharing brews over views at the onsite brewery, or simply relaxing on your private deck overlooking the eucalypt tree line. Explore the native grounds and nearby vineyards, dine on farm-to-table sustainable fare at the onsite restaurant and sample award-winning cool-climate wines from the cellar door before returning to your private pod, affording views of the bucolic surrounds from your balcony.
offer_address: 58 Washburton Rd, Ulladulla, New South Wales 2539, Australia
